name: UAP/UFO/NHI Disclosure Database
description: Comprehensive database of UAP/UFO disclosure events and NHI communication timeline. Available in English, Chinese, Spanish, Arabic, and Portuguese. 综合UAP/UFO披露数据库。Base de datos de divulgación OVNI. قاعدة بيانات الكشف عن UFO. Base de dados de divulgação OVNI.
